channel.title: Ipod Touch
channel.description:
Okay, well. I am going to buy an Ipod touch and I want to know a question:
1. Does jailbreaking your IPOD touch stuff anything up on it? 2. If you jailbreak an IPOD touch can you code on it :S? 3. If you jailbreak it can you get free games and songs and that?
Thanks :D

item.title: Ipod Touch
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

When are they gonna bring out the new one? How much to?

Read full topic

yes you can
yes
PS dont buy an itouch yet cuz you will feel like a faggot when they release their new one soon

True. Bought mine in Feb. Shoulda waited.

feb isnt so bad but now, its like 1 month before the new release[/quote]

item.title: Ipod Touch
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“im hard, post:11, topic:298154”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=394559.msg2936311#msg2936311 date=1251579301]
Get the iPhone.
[/quote]

How about you give me another 800$ and then I will?

  1. Its safe, its like updating from apple, use this guide: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YHUXgoM3b10
  2. Im not sure
  3. free apps but not songs

Okie dokie. Thanks for that link to.[/quote]
$800? It’s $99 with a 2-year plan where I live…

item.title: Ipod Touch
item.dc:creator: @Fission Fission
item.description:
@Fission wrote:

  1. What?
  2. You won’t be able to compile/etc, but you can open .java files in a text editor.
  3. Yes, you can get almost EVERY Application
  4. Jailbrake doesn’t really mess anything. I froze more with the Apple OS.
  5. Try it. It’s hella easy to repair if you don’t like it via the iTunes restore.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipod Touch
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Once in a while it does, only on applications usually, and i haven’t ever had a system error

Read full topic

item.title: Ipod Touch
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:2, topic:298154"]1. please define more efficiently.
2. No.
3. Yes.

i also recommend a 16 gb because, the firmware takes up about 1.5gb, so with 8gb you will have literally nothing, and 16 you will have plenty.[/quote]

Like, does it mess up any system settings or anything?
Does it freeze or get any errors that usally arn’t expected.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipod Touch
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

  1. please define more efficiently.
  2. No.
  3. Yes.

i also recommend a 16 gb because, the firmware takes up about 1.5gb, so with 8gb you will have literally nothing, and 16 you will have plenty.

Read full topic
